sentences.en: Dress neatly and attractively in an outfit appropriate to the job.
sentences.cn: 着装要整洁美观，适合于这份工作。

sentences.en: In terms of valuation, the run of strong earnings combined with declining stock prices translate into some attractively priced stocks.
sentences.cn: 在估值方面，强劲的盈利走势加上下跌的股价，其结果就是价格具有吸引力的股票。

sentences.en: It's an attractively illustrated, detailed guide that'svery practical.
sentences.cn: 这是一本很实用的指南，插图精美，内容详尽。

sentences.en: Orchid talcum powder makes you attractively aromatic.
sentences.cn: 常用兰花爽身粉,令您芳香迷人.

sentences.en: Set out the cakes attractively, using lacy doilies.
sentences.cn: 铺上网眼垫纸，将蛋糕摆得诱人些。

sentences.en: She got herself up very attractively.
sentences.cn: 她把自己打扮得十分迷人.

sentences.en: Special injections can make lips look attractively young and plump.
sentences.cn: 注射特殊药物可使嘴唇年轻饱满,更加迷人.

sentences.en: Still , it is dull and not always attractively presented.
sentences.cn: 这类食物通常色泽不佳、卖相一般.

sentences.en: The goods for sale were attractively laid out.
sentences.cn: 供出售的商品都陈列了出来,极引人注目.

sentences.en: The hotel is decorated imaginatively and attractively.
sentences.cn: 宾馆装修别具一格，赏心悦目。

sentences.en: The services are attractively priced and are tailored to suit individual requirements.
sentences.cn: 服务费价格诱人且内容按个人需求量身定制。

sentences.en: Their products are presented more attractively.
sentences.cn: 他们的产品展示更吸引人.

sentences.en: Those chocolates have been packaged very attractively.
sentences.cn: 那些巧克力包装得很吸引人.

sentences.en: Using European Wood - Alu . windows make it ? attractively for the colorful style buildings.
sentences.cn: 欧式木铝门窗使具有鲜艳色彩的建筑风格更加迷人.

sentences.en: Wishes the March Eighth to be joyful, is forever young attractively!
sentences.cn: 祝三八妇女节快乐, 永远年轻漂亮!

sentences.en: Women dress attractively in a great variety of colours.
sentences.cn: 妇女们的服装五光十色,很漂亮.

words.tran_cn: 吸引人的；有魅力的；引人注目的
吸引，吸引力；引力；吸引人的事物
[自] 吸引子；引起注意的人
迷人地；有吸引力地；动人地
